overview: Steelite Creations Willow Smoked Gourmet Deep Rimmed Bowl (10.75" / 27.25cm) | Strength inspired by the British willow tree | Perfect for hotels, restaurants, and banquets | Dishwasher, freezer, and microwave safe | Thermal shock resistant | Stain resistant | Strong and resilient | Lifetime Edge Chip Warranty | The Willow range offers multi-level presentation through a series of wide rim gourmet plates and tableware purposefully created for fine dining and premium presentation. Steelite Willow is designed for banqueting operations with all the practicalities required for elevating chef's presentations. | The natural willow wood originates from middle England and is a strong white-based wood with a hidden strength making this the perfect name for this addition to Steelite's fine dining and banqueting offerings. It has elegant profiles that exude sophistication yet have hidden strength and lasting durability. A pure white finish is decorated with a tasteful grid pattern that works to cast attention to the food on the plate. | Through the 'Creation' banner, Steelite have experimented with the range by transferring its willow lined rim design over to glass. Available in clear or smoked variants, every piece is decorated with a tasteful grid pattern. | All items in this range are microwave, oven, and dishwasher safe as well as being resistant to stains and thermal shock. | Additionally, this collection is | covered by Steelite's Lifetime Edge Chip Warranty | as an assurance of its longevity and quality. | Steelite are an internationally renowned manufacturer of quality tableware. With an illustrious history making crockery in Stoke-on-Trent for over a century, Steelite are committed to producing durable and attractive products.

Steelite Scape Smoked Glass Oval Bowl (5" / 12.5cm) | Crafted in England by Steelite | Organic shapes | Subtle textures | Microwave, oven, freezer, and dishwasher safe | Made in England by Steelite, the Scape glass tableware collection has been inspired by the living elements in natural landscapes. The subtle textures and organic shapes can complement both casual settings and more formal environments. The glass material also offers and interesting alternative to traditional ceramic tableware. Designed for professional use, they are strong and durable.

Steelite Ink Crackle Taupe Coupe Bowl (10" / 25.5cm) | Inspired by ancient pottery glazing technqiues | Handcrafted aesthetics | Microwave, freezer, and dishwasher safe | Exceptional thermal and mechanical shock resistance | Lifetime Edge Chip Warranty | Ink from Steelite is a range that celebrates the traditional crackle patterns that go back to ancient pottery. The Taupe colour option brings a warm, earthy tone to the tabletop and provides a perfect canvas for various dishes, whether it’s a crisp summer salad or a hearty roast dinner. These beautiful pieces will add texture and nuance to casual and contemporary food presentations. Steelite Ink Crackle is aesthetically compatible with both plain white and many other of Steelite's other craft inspired ranges. | These items are also microwave, freezer, and dishwasher safe.
